C/O NOT REQUIRED FOR DAYCARE IN HOME.                                    A dwelling unit where child day care services are provided for 12 or fewer children
shall be classified as an R-3 occupancy and as a Family Child Day Care Facility provided that:
1. The dwelling unit is contained within a one- or two-family dwelling;
2. Child day care services are provided for less than 24 hours;
3. The dwelling unit is used primarily as a private residence;and
4. The provision of day care services is accessory to the principal use of the dwelling unit as a residence.
At least one portable fire extinguisher  with a minimum rating of 2-A:10-B:C shall be mounted in the portion of the building used for family child day care and in kitchens and other cooking areas within the fire area containing the Family Child Day Care Facility.
